enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Juniors, Seniors & Graduate Students Only.
title: WCAS EARTH 438-0-01 Advanced Topics in Geophysics

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value:
The seminar will cover the red planet Mars, starting with its role in the history of science, its physical characteristics, covering historic and recent missions and the results, and theories for its evolution and tectonic activity, including evidence for water and implications for life and its origin there and possible existence.
Future human missions will be discussed.

subject: EARTH
